description: Non-material Amendment to planning application reference 585/APP/2017/2819 (Outline planning application with means of site access from the central access road (internal access, layout, scale, appearance and landscaping reserved for subsequent approval) for the erection of up to 90 dwellings (Use Class C3), sustainable urban drainage features and all other necessary ancillary and enabling works) to amend the trigger of Condition 10.
decision_conditions: Condition 10 of planning permission ref. 585/APP/2017/2819 dated 14-03-19 is amended to:

Prior to above ground works, full details of all materials and external surfaces, including details of balconies have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Thereafter the development shall be constructed in accordance with the approved details and be retained as such.
Details should include information relating to make, product/type, colour and photographs/images.
To ensure that the development presents a satisfactory appearance in accordance with Policy DMHB 11 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two (2020).
The applicant is advised that this non-material amendment relates only to the wording of Condition 10 of planning consent ref: 585/APP/2017/2819 dated 14-03-19.

Notwithstanding the non-material amendment hereby approved, all other conditions relating to planning permission ref: 585/APP/2017/2819 must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission or previously consented amendments.
site_name: LAND EAST OF MONS BARRACK BLOCK (LEOMB)
